mapper.insert: insert into tb_dictionary_info (dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{dictionaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionaryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_dictionary_info where dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_dictionary_info
select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no from tb_dictionary_info where type_code=#{typeCode} and dictionary_code=#{dicCode}
select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no from tb_dictionary_info where type_code=#{typeCode} and dictionary_code is null

select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no from tb_dictionary_info
dictionary_code is null
and type_name like concat('%',#{typeName},'%')
and type_code like concat('%',#{typeCode},'%')
select dictionary_id, type_name, type_code, dictionary_name, dictionary_code, remarks, order_no from tb_dictionary_info where type_code=#{typeCode} and dictionary_code is not null order by order_no
